Q_NAME: Given an array arr[], find the maximum j  i such that arr[j] > arr[i]
Q_DESC:
Given an array A of integers, find the maximum of j - i subjected to the constraint of A[i] <= A[j].
Example :
A : [3 5 4 2]
Output : 2 
for the pair (3, 4)
 Input:The first line contains an integer N depicting the size of array and next line followed by the value of array.

Output:
Print the maximum difference of the indexes i and j in a separate line.
